parameters.name: On
parameters.description: Turns the device off. Also toggles the switch accordingly.

parameters.name: Activate
parameters.description: If the vessel's being interrogated, stop interrogating the vessel; or nothing.

parameters.name: Setting
parameters.description: Set output watts to the specified number.

parameters.name: Horizontal
parameters.description: Set dish's horizontal angle to the specified number.

parameters.name: Vertical
parameters.description: Set dish's vertical angle to the specified number.

parameters.name: TargetPadIndex
parameters.description: Sets the landing pad index for potential call down.

parameters.name: BestContactFilter
parameters.description: Lock dish to track the specified ContactIDHash ONLY, set to -1 to unlock.

outputs.name: On
outputs.description: The Dish is not powered. This is the same as the physical red powerswitch located on the structure.

outputs.name: Activate
outputs.description: Read out current Activate value; if Activate == 1, it means the dish is either interrogating the vessel or the vessel is just coming down to landing pad.

outputs.name: Power
outputs.description: The dish is not powered. Can be read to determine if the dish is correctly powered or not. Set by the power system, return 1 if powered and 0 if not.

outputs.name: Setting
outputs.description: Read out current dish's output watts.

outputs.name: Horizontal
outputs.description: Read out current dish's horizontal angle.

outputs.name: Vertical
outputs.description: Read out current dish's vertical angle.

outputs.name: RequiredPower
outputs.description: Idle operating power quantity. Does not include extra power during actual usage.

outputs.name: Idle
outputs.description: Read out if the dish is not moving.

outputs.name: Error
outputs.description: 1 if device is in error state, otherwise 0.

outputs.name: SignalStrength
outputs.description: The signal strength of currently tracking signal, negative value, larger is better. If the dish is moving, this value always show -1.

outputs.name: SignalID
outputs.description: The signal IDHASH of currently tracking signal.

outputs.name: InterrogationProgress
outputs.description: This value only has meaning if the dish has started interrogation to the vessel. Show's percentage on the process of the interrogation.

outputs.name: TargetPadIndex
outputs.description: Read out current value of target landing pad index, useful if you want to call down the vessel by code.

outputs.name: SizeX
outputs.description: The length on X axis of the vessel, see SHUTTLE_TYPE.

outputs.name: SizeZ
outputs.description: The length on Z axis of the vessel, see SHUTTLE_TYPE.

outputs.name: Reagents
outputs.description: Total number of reagents inside the device (e.g. 92g of iron = 92).

outputs.name: MinimumWattsToContact
outputs.description: The minimum watts required reaching target vessel before one can initiate interrogation. This is the requirement imposed by the vessel.

outputs.name: WattsReachingContact
outputs.description: The current effective watts reached target vessel due to angle setting and dish's watts output setting.

outputs.name: ContactTypeId
outputs.description: The category of the vessel, see ContactTypeID.

outputs.name: BestContactFilter
outputs.description: Currently locked ContactID, or -1 if not set.

outputs.name: StackSize
outputs.description: Read out the stack Byte count of the structure.

outputs.name: NameHash
outputs.description: The hash of the custom name of the structure.

outputs.name: PrefabHash
outputs.description: The hash of the structure.

outputs.name: ReferenceId
outputs.description: Unique Reference Identifier for this object.
